segments.text: This scene breaks my heart a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, missing the dangers around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows the sink, ruining the cabinets slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle could lead to a slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is in real peril; it tilts precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be serious with the hard floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, so innocent yet part of the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting cookies, but it's heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside highlights the turmoil inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and keep them safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness to hazard feels so poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me think of lost moments of protection.
segments.speaker: PAR
